Pre-Game Insights: Both teams qualified for Euro 2024 as group winners.
Hungary has been in fine form under manager Marco Rossi, winning nine of their last 16 matches.
Turkey, managed by Vincenzo Montella, has also had a strong run, including a friendly win over Germany.
Hungary has won the previous three encounters against Turkey between 1995 and 2007.
Marco Rossi and Vincenzo Montella will meet as opposing coaches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is an international friendly in Budapest.
The teams have strong forms and have had few issues scoring.
